Text.Page:
The search for Elleon has begun! Legate Lam introduced you to some other survivors of the first landing and the force commander, Adria. Along the way, you learned some uneasy truths about what really happened and a few sage words of advice.

Adria welcomed you but warned that the mission was vitalâ€”and treacherous. The expeditionary force is not alone on the Island of Dawn...

Well, first we need to see who's even still here. That's something you can do. Axelle and I are waiting for our ride out of here, but Adria is trying to get that list together.

Take a quick headcount on the way down to her.

I haven't seen Elleon for a while, come to think of it. Make sure you check in with him, too.

A headcount of who's still here? You know, I resent that. I should hardly have to be accountable to some new recruit sent in for cleanup.

Oh well. I suppose it isn't your fault. Anyway, yes, add "Kishale" to that list of yours. Present and accounted for.

Hey, when you get to Elleon, can you remind him about those crystals he borrowed "for just a minute"? I think he and I measure time differently.

Yes, I'm still here. My orders are to stay here until we get the last of these ghilliedhus cleaned up.

Hey, when you run into Elleon, can you see if he'll swing by and help me?

Yes, yes...I'm still here. I swear, this is the third time someone's been by counting us up. Where does she think we'll go?

Anyway, there actually is a bit more to clean up here on the island, so I'm glad you're here. Adria's up at the Tower Base. I'm sure she's waiting for you.

By the way, have you seen Elleon?

Oh good. Thank you for taking this headcount. I can't tell you how it....

Wait, I think you forgot to put Elleon's name on this list. Didn't you see him? That's...he can't have disappeared again!

You know what, speak to Jorhon. He's got some things that need handling. I'll look into this in the meantime.
